channel.title: How can I change the look or colour of a item? For client or Source
channel.description:
Well I have got a open client and a source, I just want to know is there anyway to change the look and I know there is a tut on changing the name so I don't need help with that.
So can anyone like point me in a direction to a tut or something?

item.title: How can I change the look or colour of a item? For client or Source
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Client Side, Ask There, Someone Here Can, Cant Remember The Bloomin Name Though :o

Read full topic

so long answer it is possible but not for us
